data.description: Several methods to compute check digits
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I began writing the module under the name CheckDigits but looking
    at the module list I found it more appropriate as
    Algorithm::CheckDigits.

    The module provides a coherent interface for more than 40
    algorithms to compute checkdigits (19 at the moment implemented),
    validate numbers, extract the base number and the check digit.

    This module does not consider additional information provided
    besides the check digit as does for instance Business::ISBN.
